alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fremont, southwestern Mills, southeastern Sarpy and eastern Cass Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 807 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Cedar Creek, or 9 miles southwest of Offutt AFB, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plattsmouth around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Beaver Lake, Murray, Union and Nehawka. This includes Interstate 29 near mile marker 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Omaha.
